SEARCH
Package com.clientui.clientui.configuration

Class FilterConfig

java.lang.Object
com.clientui.clientui.configuration.FilterConfig
@Configuration public class FilterConfig extends Object
Configuration class for custom filters in the MicroDiab application. Registers a custom authentication headers filter to ensure headers are available before Spring Security processes the request.

This class is annotated with @Configuration to indicate that it contains Spring bean definitions.

  • Method Details

    • customAuthHeadersFilter

      @Bean(name="customAuthHeadersFilter") public org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.FilterRegistrationBean<AuthHeadersFilter> customAuthHeadersFilter()
      Creates a FilterRegistrationBean for the AuthHeadersFilter. This filter is registered with the lowest possible order to ensure it runs before Spring Security and applies to all URL patterns.
      Returns:
      A FilterRegistrationBean instance for the custom filter.
